name: Purchase Order Tracker
query:
SELECT
    po.name AS "PO No:Link/Purchase Order:150",
    po.transaction_date AS "PO Date:Date:120",
    poi.custom_lms_id AS "LMS ID:Link/Lastmile Services Master:150",
    poi.custom_circuit_id AS "Circuit Id:Link/Site:150",
    po.supplier_name AS "Supplier Name:Data:200",
    po.rounded_total AS "PO Amount:Currency:150",
    po.status AS "PO Status:Data:120",
    lms.lms_stage AS "LMS Stage:Data:150",
    site.site_status AS "Site Status:Data:150",
    site.date AS "Site Delivery Date:Date:150",
    pi.bill_no AS "Purchase Invoice:Link/Purchase Invoice:150",
    pi.status AS "Purchase Invoice Status:Data:150"
FROM
    `tabPurchase Order` po
JOIN
    `tabPurchase Order Item` poi ON poi.parent = po.name
LEFT JOIN
    `tabLastmile Services Master` lms ON lms.name = poi.custom_lms_id
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSite` site ON site.name = poi.custom_circuit_id
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pii ON pii.lms_id = poi.custom_lms_id
LEFT JOIN
    `tabPurchase Invoice` pi ON pi.name = pii.parent
